title: The LeBron-Era Lakers’ Drama Intensifies | Heat Check (Ep. 332)
description:
The Los Angeles Lakers add another loss to their turbulent start to the regular season (4:07), and the league’s offensive explosion is transforming defensive schemes (27:34). Plus, examining the importance of providing context to Derrick Rose’s comeback narrative (55:04).

Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Juliet Litman, Justin Verrier, Haley O’Shaughnessy

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
